pages.text: $(item)Barrel Lids$() are used to seal $(item)Open Barrels$() when used in the different water purifier multiblocks.$(br2)Barrel Lids$() can be set in the open or closed positions, but will need to be closed to allow the water purifier multiblocks to function. Failing to do so will result in the evaporated water escaping as steam.
